website_summaries.verdict: These newly-restyled tennis shoes are a great choice for consumers who like lots of support.
pros: Low-profile, lightweight design, which allows for plenty of airflow, was inspired by professional tennis players
Plantar Support Chassis provides support and stability on the court
cons: We found that this style has less cushioning on the inside and sole than some competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Supportive insoles required
customer_reviews.text: The weekend after I played tennis in these shoes my plantar fasciitis returned and my back ached and head pounded. Thankfully the insoles were removable and I inserted "Superfeet" insoles this last weekend. My foot and back pain is subsiding now. I was drawn to KSwiss for a couple reasons. Amazon has KSwiss styles with more colors than just white or pink and that is why I went from my former Prince and Nike brands at my local sports store. My husband also owns a pair and loves how light they are and he seems to fly across court so I thought maybe if I had a pair (of Big Shots) it could help with my speed.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: For the money I love them. And I don't ordinarily buy less expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I do have flat feet so I use the cheap arch supports from Walmart. But I have played in k Swiss shoes for 11 years. For the money I love them. And I don't ordinarily buy less expensive shoes. They also have a little extra support on the outside of your foot so when you are starting and stopping your foot doesn't feel like it will roll to the outside. Love them, love them. Also they play fairly cool on a hot tennis court.
customer_reviews.author: darby21

customer_reviews.title: Good support, but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for price & support (more rigid midfoot for plantar's faciitis). Look good, seem rugged, but fabric on back of heel (cuff) has a texture that consistently pulls my socks down :( and one of the cuffs is permanently crushed down, after slipping the shoe on quickly (I know, I should untie, but I've done it with countless tennis shoes, and never had the cuff break down/crush and be unable to pull it up). But the price was good. I doubt they will last as long as my last.
customer_reviews.author: in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Ankle pain
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to love these shoes! I was excited to finally get a proper pair of tennis shoes for tennis. After the first couple of hours of wearing them my ankle was very sore. I attempted to play in them a few more times but couldn't get used to the uncomfortable feeling. I had to buy a different kind shoe by Adidas (Galaxy) that don't hurt my ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: ctr12

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe with lots of toe room
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe with lots of toe room! These are now my third pair and will keep adding to my shoe collection! I have one pair that I wear five days a week eight hours a day at work for over a year now and they still look great and one of my other pairs I use for working out! LOVE thes shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable, although they did blister the inside of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner so no tennis shoe expert. These are comfortable, although they did blister the inside of my ankles pretty badly at first and are strangely tight there. Once I got past that, I liked them. They're cute, functional, I move well, and so far seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I bought my first in a tennis shop and paid twice as much. Light weight. Fits as expected. I wear a 9.5 and they are a perfect fit. Great shoe for Pickleball players! as the shoe is lighter and easy to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: From Arizona Sandra

customer_reviews.title: My wife really likes the feel of the show, ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes the feel of the show, but it fits a little high and gave her a blister below the ankle. However, she didn't want to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: DavidA

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, wish the colors weren't as bright. May try to purchase some non-neon laces so my feet don't draw your eye like a neon sign.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with my tennis team outfit and they were on sale. I like K-Swiss shoes as they don't dig my achilles and are a good width.
customer_reviews.author: MRS SARAH CASHMAN

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these shoes. They left a blister on my right Achilles - where I had surgery. I am hoping that will get better with time.
customer_reviews.author: mnl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe for Tennis!
customer_reviews.text: I play tennis 3x a week and always have worn K- Swiss. They are so comfortable, very durable, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Real Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pair of K-Swiss. I got so many compliments on them. They really look sweet. My only issue with them was the break in process. The top of the left shoe was the problem area. There was too much pressure right beneath the Ankle. I tightened and laced the shoe all the way and it was then bearable. It took about two days but it was worth it. They are so nice and comfortable. I bought a size 6 and I am usually a size 6. I don't know if I would have had the same problem had I ordered a 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very, very stiff shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so stiff, it must take years to break them in. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rose

customer_reviews.title: Provide good support and traction on clay courts
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these shoes and noticed a difference in her game when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE C. BRONSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter for playing tennis. We love k-swiss brand - the shoes provide excellent support needed when playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand for tennis. Always a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: S.J

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: narrow fit and no toe room, evened ordered half size larger. Also very heavy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I also buy K-Swiss for tennis. They fit and wear longer than other tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Allen List

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for all day wear. Supportive and cushioned around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love the colors and the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love the colors, red white and blue was the theme, so it calls for atention!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: a lip digs into my ankle...
customer_reviews.text: Just dig in at my ankle, there is a little lip and it digs in and blisters....
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my Kswiss big shot II
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Kswiss big shot II. It is without a doubt the most comfortable Kswiss shoe that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gabel

customer_reviews.title: This is my first pair of colorful tennis shoes and I love
customer_reviews.text: I play tennis several times per week and have worn K Swiss shoes for years. This is my first pair of colorful tennis shoes and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Bell

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for tennis. I play three days ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for tennis. I play three days a week, and after the first day I knew that even though they fit properly, they don't have enough support in any area to be suitable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I have repurchased this style shoe over and over. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have repurchased this style shoe over and over. This shoe is well constructed, and solved the problem I was having with my arches.
customer_reviews.author: amazon reviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Run true to size and price was unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: annette brady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good support but not as cushy as my old K-Swiss!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I work out daily in these and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Butler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift. She loves the ugly ass shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! For someone who has a over pronating problem my feet r happy!
customer_reviews.author: jabbyabby

customer_reviews.title: padding on sole too lite
customer_reviews.text: padding seems lite. Fit good but I feel sore on the balls of my feet after playing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Gerza

product_meta.title: K-SWISS Women's BigshotII Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: K-Swiss is a heritage American tennis brand founded by two Swiss brothers who moved to California to pursue their dream of starting a footwear company. After 50 years of representing the best of on court performance and off court style, K-Swiss stays true to their founders and is dedicated to inspiring and outfitting the next generation of entrepreneurs.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Synthetic, Tennis
